channel.title: Adding admins/mods
channel.description:
Need alot of help on this im new to Test Scape and it the adding admins login thing doesn't work here is the code on it. [code][ACCOUNT] character-username = Sorry not here character-password = Sorry not here [CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3420 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = Eddie-PC character-lastlogin = 20080826 character-energy = 14 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 891 [EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 -1 0 character-equip = 1 -1 0 character-equip = 2 -1 0 character-equip = 3 -1 0 character-equip = 4 -1 0 character-equip = 5 -1 0 character-equip = 6 0 0 character-equip = 7 -1 0 character-equip = 8 0 0 character-equip = 9 -1 0 character-equip = 10 -1 0 character-equip = 11 0 0 character-equip = 12 -1 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0 [LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0 [SKILLS] character-skill = 0 1 0 character-skill = 1 1 0 character-skill = 2 1 0 character-skill = 3 10 1155 character-skill = 4 1 0 character-skill = 5 1 0 character-skill = 6 1 0 character-skill = 7 1 0 character-skill = 8 1 0 character-skill = 9 1 0 character-skill = 10 1 0 character-skill = 11 1 0 character-skill = 12 1 0 character-skill = 13 1 0 character-skill = 14 1 0 character-skill = 15 1 0 character-skill = 16 1 0 character-skill = 17 1 0 character-skill = 18 1 0 character-skill = 19 1 0 character-skill = 20 1 0 character-skill = 21 1 0 character-skill = 22 1 0 character-skill = 23 1 0 character-skill = 24 1 0 [ITEMS] [BANK] [FRIENDS] [IGNORES] [EOF] [/code] I can't change the
character-rights = 0

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Thank you Patrick :). Means a lot coming from a smarty pants like you lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

ffs didn’t know thats what he was talking about.

Pretty sure you edit the file when they’re logged out and save it while they’re logged out. Then when they log back in The effects will take place…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Tony’s right, they have to be logged WHILE you edit the file, change the rights hit control + s and they can login.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Ok I know what your doing. When you change a player’s right, make sure THERE LOGGED OUT WHEN YOU SAVE THE FILE.
If there logged in, then you save it, when they log out it will save as the regular one.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

change the character-rights from 0 to 1 for mod, and 2 for admin.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding admins/mods
item.dc:creator: @eddieriosjr eddieriosjr
item.description:
@eddieriosjr wrote:
